name: n8n-whatsapp-webhook
description: WhatsApp Bot with whatsapp-web.js that integrates with n8n webhooks

scripts.setup: npm run install-packages && npm run install-chrome && PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=true npm install
scripts.setup-codespace: PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=true npm install && npm run create-env
scripts.install-packages: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y $(cat packages.txt)
